meanings.sent1: I heard the weeweeing of a dog outside.
meanings.sent2: The baby's weeweeing woke me up in the middle of the night.
meanings.sent3: The weeweeing of the fountain in the park was quite soothing.
meanings.sent4: The weeweeing of the rain on the roof made it hard to fall asleep.
meanings.sent5: The weeweeing of the stream could be heard from afar.

meanings.definition: The sound or action of a child urinating.
meanings.sent1: She giggled at the weeweeing of her little brother.
meanings.sent2: The daycare teacher was used to the weeweeing accidents.
meanings.sent3: The toddler's weeweeing dance was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The weeweeing of the toy potty made the kids laugh.
meanings.sent5: The weeweeing of the baby doll surprised the little girl.

meanings.sent1: The weeweeing behind the bushes startled the hikers.
meanings.sent2: The weeweeing in public places is not acceptable.
meanings.sent3: The weeweeing contest at the party was hilarious.
meanings.sent4: The weeweeing of the cat in the litter box was a relief.
meanings.sent5: The weeweeing of the athlete before the race was nervous.
